channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Hydrate. Make lists. Leave yourself time. And other tips for reducing holiday travel stress
item.description: Travel, especially during the holiday season, can be stressful. But following some tips from the pros as you prepare for a trip can make for a smoother, less anxious experience.

item.title: People on breathing machines struggle without power after weather disasters
item.description: Extreme weather is making power outages longer and more frequent across the U.S. People with health conditions who depend on medical devices powered by electricity are particularly vulnerable.

item.title: Idaho teen is arrested in connection with a dead infant found in a baby box at a hospital
item.description: Idaho police say a teenager has been arrested in connection with the body of an infant found last month at a hospital in a box meant for people to anonymously give up a newborn.
